resources.string:
# MLKITAPP

A modern Android app demonstrating various ML Kit features with a beautiful Material Design interface.

---

## ✨ Features
- Text Recognition: Extract text from images using ML Kit.
- Face Detection: Detect faces in photos with real-time processing.
- Barcode Scanning: Scan and decode barcodes and QR codes.
- Object Detection: Identify and track objects in images.

---

## 🖌️ UI Highlights
- Material Toolbar and Bottom Navigation for easy navigation
- Colorful, attractive buttons and layout
- Responsive and user-friendly design

---

## 🚀 Getting Started
1. Clone the repository
2. Open in Android Studio
3. Build & Run on your Android device or emulator

---

## 🛠️ Tech Stack
- Language: Java/Kotlin
- UI: Material Components
- ML: Google ML Kit

---

## 🤝 Contributing
Pull requests are welcome! For major changes, please open an issue first to discuss what you would like to change.

---

## 📄 License
MIT

---

Made with ❤️ using ML Kit and Material Design
